reviewText: This set is an important part of Indias spritural knowlege Excellent series as is the original buy it now !

Pros:
1. Great picture quality.

Cons:
1. You can't skip the ads at the beginning of the dvd. You have to wait 4 minutes before you get to the menu. Really annoying.
2.  No scene selections within the episodes.
3.  Some dvds were scratched a little, but still played fine.
The quality of DVD could have been a little better.  However, I do like the story.  4 stars represents the technical aspect rather than the content.
